}} '''Cheryl''' is one of Ross and Monica's aunts. Consequently, she is the great-aunt to [[Emma Geller-Greene|Emma]], [[Ben Geller|Ben]], [[Jack Geller-Bing|Jack]] and [[Erica Geller-Bing|Erica]]. She is [[cousin Frannie]]'s mother. It's unclear what part of the family she comes from and what relationship links she with Geller family, probably [[Jack Geller|Jack Geller's]] sister as she wasn't at Althea's funeral.
